description: This file appears to be a shell script used for network configuration in embedded devices, specifically managing Wi-Fi mesh interfaces, bridge configurations, and backhaul setups via commands like brctl, ifconfig, and ovs-vsctl. It contains logic for different device models and modes, setting IP addresses, creating bridges, and adding interfaces for Wi-Fi mesh backhaul.

methods.name: mesh_bridges
methods.description: Configures Wi-Fi interfaces to the mesh backhaul bridges, adding interfaces to bridges and bringing them up.

methods.name: mesh_bhaul
methods.description: Creates and sets up the backhaul bridge for Ethernet Pod connection.

methods.name: is_vlan
methods.description: Checks if the given network interface is a VLAN interface.

methods.name: vlan_root
methods.description: Extracts the root interface name from a VLAN interface name.

methods.name: bridge_interfaces
methods.description: Lists all non-STP interfaces associated with a specified bridge.

methods.name: bridge_set_mtu
methods.description: Sets the MTU for all interfaces associated with a bridge.

methods.name: mesh_bridge_setup
methods.description: Creates mesh bridge interfaces and adds Wi-Fi interfaces to them, with optional MTU settings.

methods.name: mesh_bridge_ip
methods.description: Assigns an IP address with netmask to a specified interface.
